SleepQualityPSQIA validated questionnaire for measuring sleep quality over the past month. Based on the Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index (PSQI) by Buysse et al. Global scores >5 indicate poor sleep quality.Questionáriohttps://2rdoc.pt/ig/ios-lifestyle-medicine/Questionnaire/sleep-quality-psqi#0.1.0

psqi_q9During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
sleep_latencySleep Latency0..1group
psqi_q2During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?1..1integer
psqi_q5aDuring the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
sleep_durationSleep Duration0..1group
psqi_q4During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spend in bed.)1..1decimal
sleep_efficiencySleep Efficiency0..1group
psqi_q1During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?1..1time
psqi_q3During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?1..1time
sleep_disturbancesSleep Disturbances0..1group
psqi_q5bHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you wake up in the middle of the night or early morning?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5cHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you have to get up to use the bathroom?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5dHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot breathe comfortably?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5eHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you cough or snore loudly?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5fHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too cold?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5gHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too hot?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5hHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you had bad dreams?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q5iHow often have you had trouble sleeping because you have pain?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
sleep_medicationSleep Medication Use0..1group
psqi_q6During the past month, how often have you taken medicine (prescribed or over the counter) to help you sleep?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
daytime_dysfunctionDaytime Dysfunction0..1group
psqi_q7During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options
psqi_q8During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?1..1choiceOpções: 4 options

name: SleepQualityPSQI
title: Sleep Quality Assessment (PSQI-Based)
description: A validated questionnaire for measuring sleep quality over the past month. Based on the Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index (PSQI) by Buysse et al. Global scores >5 indicate poor sleep quality.

item.text: Subjective Sleep Quality
During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?
Sleep Latency
During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?
During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: Sleep Duration
During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spend in bed.)
Sleep Efficiency
During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?
During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?
Sleep Disturbances
How often have you had trouble sleeping because you wake up in the middle of the night or early morning?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you have to get up to use the bathroom?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot breathe comfortably?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you cough or snore loudly?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too cold?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too hot?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you had bad dreams?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: How often have you had trouble sleeping because you have pain?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: Sleep Medication Use
During the past month, how often have you taken medicine (prescribed or over the counter) to help you sleep?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: Daytime Dysfunction
During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?

answerOption.valueString: Three or more times a week

item.text: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?
